code: import axios from"axios";import{deleteToken,errorHandler,getToken}from"./helper";import{root}from'../../config';var logout=function logout(){deleteToken();var redirectUrl=window.location.pathname;return window.location.href="/login?redirect="+redirectUrl;};var Connector=axios.create();Connector.interceptors.request.use(function(config){config.baseURL=root;console.log(config);if(getToken()!=="undefined"){config.headers["Authorization"]=getToken()?"Bearer ".concat(getToken()):"";}config.headers["Content-Type"]="application/json";config.headers["Accept"]="application/json";return config;},function(error){return Promise.reject(error);});Connector.interceptors.response.use(function(response){console.log(response);return response;},function(error){errorHandler(error);return Promise.reject(error);});export default Connector;
